response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, representing years of dedication and innovation. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, but I am confident it has the potential to deliver substantial benefits to you.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an exceptional deal for someone who recognizes its true potential.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or would like more information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the details you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
